column4: Can anyone explain to me how I get video output to an external monitor, after I have plugged it into my laptop? I'm fiddling with the Screens and Graphics dialog but not getting anything out
did you reboot the computer after you plugged it in? is it enabled in BIOS (some laptops need it, some don't)?
-- I'm gonna try rebooting ... it has just set my main screen resolution way way down and now won't let it back up. Back in a sec
no probs. usually the VGA port activates during boot.
